subject: Order check
description_text:
Hi

One of my tracking links say the order is cancelled. Can you please confirm if items are all shipped under the one link now or is there an issue/delay?

SF6047154797928 - cancelled

SF6047154797876 - in transit

Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Jamie Mole,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Your tracking number was unexpectedly canceled. I have resubmitted it for you.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047181799250
